The researcher said it to the Almighty: Did he not make their affection in misleading, etc.The cavity after it, as if it was said: He was made their affliction in the hand of the kaaba and its disbursement and the honor of its people to them in the pledge of allegiance and the pledge of allegiance; That their destruction is the most common destruction, and the origin of misguidance is lost if it is lost, then it is here for the abuse, and from it it was said to the liability of the lost gay; Because he spared the king of his father and lost him.
